description: Complete system overview documenting the migraine tracking system architecture, component relationships, and integration points with external health systems
Detailed documentation of the correlation algorithms for migraine analysis, including sleep quality scoring, glucose impact analysis, and weather correlation calculations
Comprehensive documentation of data models for health metrics (sleep, glucose, migraines), their relationships, and integration with external medical systems like Nightscout and Dexcom
Technical specification of the headache classification system, including symptom mapping, severity calculations, and pattern matching algorithms
Documentation of data flow between components, including CGM data processing, sleep analysis pipeline, and weather data integration
